metadataNotFound: Warning! Requested metadata with id {{id}} not found. Create a new one ?
noLayersForThumbnail: No layer defined in record to generate thumbnail from
noTemplatesAvailable: Warning! There is no templates available in the catalog. You should add or import some.
notFoundInThesaurus: Warning! Keywords {{keywords}} not found in thesaurus. This may happen when keywords are in a language that is not in the current user interface language. Multilingual keywords editing is not supported. Those keywords will not be modified by this editing session unless you remove this thesaurus section.

thumbnailMaker-help: All WMS layers registered in the metadata record are added to the map. Choose a layout (Thumbnail recommended), a scale, zoom to the area of interest to generate the thumbnail.
to-iso19139-keyword-as-xlink-help: Useful for creating a link between the record and the thesaurus. An xlink:href attribute is added to the gmd:descriptiveKeywords element.
to-iso19139-keyword-help: Default mode. Insert keyword as simple text using gco:CharacterString element.
to-iso19139-keyword-with-anchor-help: Useful for having an hyperlink on the keyword which usually is the keyword identifier. A gmx:Anchor element is used for each keywords.
unsupportedSchemaAlert: Metadata {{title}} is using {{schema}} standard. This is not supported by the editor. Return to editor board.
validate-help: بررسی رکورد در مقابل قوانین اعتبار سنجی استاندارد
suggestionListError: بعضی چیزها زمان بازیابی پیشنهادات با مشکل روبرو شد
editorBoardInfo: در این صفحه امکان اضافه کردن رکور فراداده، بارگذاری فایل و همچنین مدیریت رکورهای فراداده وجود دارد.
